result.content:
Feature: Player shoots arrows


Scenario: Player shoots the wumpus

player starts in cave 0
enemy player starts in cave 5
wumpus starts in cave 18
bat 1 starts in cave 19
bat 2 starts in cave 13
pit 1 starts in cave 3
pit 2 starts in cave 13
player starts in cave 9
wumpus starts in cave 18
player moves to cave 10
player shoots at cave 18
wumpus will be dead
game is won

Scenario: Player misses the wumpus and it remains asleep

player starts in cave 0
enemy player starts in cave 5
wumpus starts in cave 18
bat 1 starts in cave 19
bat 2 starts in cave 13
pit 1 starts in cave 3
pit 2 starts in cave 13
player starts in cave 0
wumpus starts in cave 18
player shoots at cave 1
wumpus remains asleep
wumpus will be at cave 18
game is still on

Scenario Outline: Player misses the wumpus and it wakes up and moves

player starts in cave 0
enemy player starts in cave 5
wumpus starts in cave 18
bat 1 starts in cave 19
bat 2 starts in cave 13
pit 1 starts in cave 3
pit 2 starts in cave 13
player starts in cave 9
wumpus starts in cave 18
player moves to cave 10
player shoots at cave 11
wumpus wakes up and moves from cave 18 to cave 19
wumpus will be at cave 19
game is still on

Scenario Outline: Player misses the wumpus and it wakes up and moves

player starts in cave 0
enemy player starts in cave 5
wumpus starts in cave 18
bat 1 starts in cave 19
bat 2 starts in cave 13
pit 1 starts in cave 3
pit 2 starts in cave 13
player starts in cave 9
wumpus starts in cave 18
player moves to cave 10
player shoots at cave 11
wumpus wakes up and moves from cave 18 to cave 10
wumpus will be at cave 10
game is lost

Scenario: Player runs out of arrows

player starts in cave 0
enemy player starts in cave 5
wumpus starts in cave 18
bat 1 starts in cave 19
bat 2 starts in cave 13
pit 1 starts in cave 3
pit 2 starts in cave 13
player starts in cave 0
player has 1 arrow remaining
player shoots at cave 4
game is lost

Scenario: Player shoots an arrow through multiple caves

player starts in cave 0
enemy player starts in cave 5
wumpus starts in cave 18
bat 1 starts in cave 19
bat 2 starts in cave 13
pit 1 starts in cave 3
pit 2 starts in cave 13
player starts in cave 0
wumpus starts in cave 18
player shoots an arrow at caves
wumpus will be dead
game is won

Scenario: Player shoots an arrow through multiple caves but some are not linked

player starts in cave 0
enemy player starts in cave 5
wumpus starts in cave 18
bat 1 starts in cave 19
bat 2 starts in cave 13
pit 1 starts in cave 3
pit 2 starts in cave 13
player starts in cave 0
wumpus starts in cave 18
player shoots an arrow at caves
cave 15 is not linked to 0, so arrow goes to 7 instead
cave 3 is not linked to 10, so arrow goes to 18 instead
wumpus will be dead
game is won

Scenario: Player shoots an arrow through multiple caves but the arrow get back to him and kills him

player starts in cave 0
enemy player starts in cave 5
wumpus starts in cave 18
bat 1 starts in cave 19
bat 2 starts in cave 13
pit 1 starts in cave 3
pit 2 starts in cave 13
player starts in cave 0
player shoots an arrow at caves
cave 19 is not linked to 7, so arrow goes to 0 instead
player will be dead
game is lost
